faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions and answers about AI 3D cartoon generation

questions.question: Does the app create a generic 3D cartoon, or is it customized based on my photo?
questions.answer: The PortraitArt app transforms your photos into stunning works of art. Each piece is uniquely generated from the photo you provide, preserving the content, composition, and essence of the original image.

questions.question: What kind of photos should I use?
questions.answer: PortraitArt works with various types of photos, including portraits, group shots, pet photos, buildings, and scenic views. For optimal results, use high-resolution images with good lighting and a clear background.

questions.question: What other art styles can my photo be converted to?
questions.answer: PortraitArt offers a variety of art styles besides 3D cartoon, including oil painting, watercolor, illustration, colored line art, pencil sketch, line sketch, cartoon drawing, pop art, caricature, coloring pages, sculpture, Chinese ink, and more.

questions.question: How does PortraitArt handle my data?
questions.answer: Your data safety and privacy are our top priorities. All photos uploaded to PortraitArt are securely processed and used solely for creating your artwork. We do not store, share, or use your photos for any other purposes without your consent. Additionally, all data transmission is encrypted to protect your personal information. And you can choose to delete your data after creating and downloading your art pictures. For more details, please review our Privacy FAQ.
